mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_name userName, r.role_name roleName, r.role_id roleId, p.permission_id permissionId, p.permission_url permissionUrl FROM t_user u INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN t_role_permission rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN t_permission p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.isDelete = 1
AND u.user_id = #{userId}
